titleStmt.title: The wheel of fortune: or, Nothing for a penny Being remarks on the dawing [sic] the penny-lottery, at the Theatre-Royal, in Dorset-Garden, with the characters of some of the honourable trustees, and all due acknowledgments paid to his honour the undertaker. Written by a person who was cursed mad he had not the thousand pound lot.

publicationStmt.date: printed in the year 1698. Price three pence.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
